sentences.english: Some people think that a drunk can be unhappy solution, it is not.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲一酒醉能解千愁，其實不然。

sentences.english: I was drunker than I ought to be by midnight, so I said I was going for a walk.
sentences.chinese: 我酒醉得比往日厲害，因此說自己打算出去散會兒步。

sentences.english: Also because of the general level of intoxication I only managed to take 5 useable photos.
sentences.chinese: 也因爲酒醉的原因，我只拍到了5張可以看的照片。

sentences.english: Wake up, you drunkards, and weep!
sentences.chinese: 酒醉的人哪，要清醒哭泣。

sentences.english: It's like momentarily waking up from a state of grogginess to a state of heightened awareness.
sentences.chinese: 這就像是暫時從酒醉中醒來變得格外清醒一樣。

sentences.english: E. g. Lindsay Lohan was arrested for drunk driving.
sentences.chinese: 美國青春偶像琳賽羅涵因酒醉駕車而遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: The disco bouncer threw out four drunk teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯可舞廳的保鏢把四個酒醉的青少年趕出去。

sentences.english: Sober sat only in the flowers, but also to spend the next drunken sleep.
sentences.chinese: 酒醒只在花前坐，酒醉還來花下眠。

sentences.english: In a drunken rage, he demanded more cash and threatened us.
sentences.chinese: 他酒醉狂怒，拿刀威脅我們想要更多的錢。

sentences.english: Lying clouds on the month as a wild, drunken haze from time to time to buy.
sentences.chinese: 對月臥雲如野鹿，時時買酒醉煙霞。
酒醉的人哪，要清醒哭泣。

sentences.english: I had it suspended when I got my fifth DUI .
sentences.chinese: 我當我得到了我的第五個酒醉駕駛的時候它中止了嗎。

sentences.english: He always swears and blasphemes when he's drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他酒醉後總是罵罵咧咧褻瀆神靈。

sentences.english: Bridal chamber, drunken j&js mouth constantly chanting the names of the seven sister.
sentences.chinese: 洞房中，酒醉的強生嘴裏不斷念叨七妹的名字。

sentences.english: Still get the memory when I was drunk last time in BJ.
sentences.chinese: 上次酒醉北京的記憶依然猶新。

sentences.english: The police charged him with being drunk and disorderly.
sentences.chinese: 警方指控他酒醉並且擾亂治安。

definition: dead drunk/as drunk as a lord
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
variant of 醉醺醺[zui4 xun1 xun1]
capacity for alcohol/ability to hold drink
